titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of the English Graduate Association RG.39.20
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-06-27 17:56:05 -0400.

did.unittitle: Records of the English Graduate Association

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York University. English Graduate Association

did.abstract: The English Graduate Association was an organization founded in 1946 for students and alumni of the English program in the Graduate School of Arts and Science. The organization was later succeeded by the Graduate English Organization. The records of the English Graduate Association (dated 1946-1975) consist of materials documenting the group's founding, administrative activities, and lectures on literary topics. Materials include correspondence, lists of officers, meeting minutes, annual reports, and summaries of lectures.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records of the English Graduate Association (dated 1946-1975) consist of materials documenting the group's founding, administrative activities, and lectures on literary topics. Materials include correspondence, lists of officers, meeting minutes, annual reports, and summaries of lectures.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. Original order is unknown.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact New York University Archives, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: These materials were removed from the New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera during processing; their original provenance is unknown.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Records of the English Graduate Association; RG 39.20; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning, materials were rehoused in an archival box, and described on the collection-level with a folder-level inventory.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The English Graduate Association was an organization founded in 1946 for students and alumni of the English program in the Graduate School of Arts and Science. The organization was later succeeded by the Graduate English Organization.
